title: Simply Gluten Free Mexican Fiesta
description: Simply Gluten Free Mexican Fiesta gives you recipes with the rich, vibrant, sunny flavors of Mexico. Carol Kicinski gives you a variety of dishes including drinks, desserts and main dishes, so you can throw your own Mexican fiesta!A Mexican themed party menu makes gluten free entertaining less overwhelming since a lot of the ingredients in Mexican foods are naturally gluten free.Carol gives you simple gluten free recipes that have the same tastes and textures as gluten-filled foods. Regardless of whether or not you or your guests are on a gluten free diet, these recipes are sure to entertain all!You will have just as much fun cooking Carol's recipes as your guests will have eating them!
author: Carol Kicinski
